description: The goal of the project is to give facilities to post documentation or blog and give support in making different types of documentation or blog.
It allows a user to see anyone’s blog without any restriction. The users can post any kind of blog, document including video.
There will be a powerful feature like users can write comments, give likes, or upvote to others' blogs or documentation.
Also features like managing their profile will be available for users where they can update their username, password, etc.
We also want to give the whole site a theme-changing option.Here are the core features we currently have in our minds.
This means there will be interesting features like a dark mood and a bright mood also.
A user can post blogs, documentation including videos Users can write comments on blogs.
Users will have the option to manage their profiles as well. They can change their username and image also
Dark mode & light mode Users also can search for blogs regarding any topic by searching by a keyword in the search bar.
Users can report to any user they want Users can  report to any user's blog if they want
A normal user will be counted as a viewer. They can only browse the home page and blog page. For that, they don’t have to register or log in.
Users can ask any question on different kinds of topics. Users can answer the question of other users.
